answerText: Sense and Sensibility[10] This other character from Sense and Sensibility invites Elinor and Marianne to join her in Cleveland for Christmas. She is the younger sister of Lady Middleton and enjoys joking about her husbands impolite behavior.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | 8 | 18 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Lucy Steele almost marries Edward Ferrars in this novel, much to the dismay of Elinor. For 10 points each: [10] The Dashwood sisters are denied a fair share of inheritance because of their brother's wife Fanny in this novel.
